ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Anushree Bhattarai has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently she is employed as a Business Systems Analyst at Queens Healthcare. Anushree has extensive knowledge of Microsoft Visio, RUP, UML/OMT, EDI, Rational Rose, SDLC, Rational RequisitePro, Microsoft Office, JAD, Software Development Life Cycle, Microsoft Excel, Activity Diagrams, Waterfall Methodology, Oracle, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Web Portal Application, Visual Basic, SQL, Rational ClearQuest, Perl Programming, Oracle 9i, Oracle 10G, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Access, Microsoft ASP.NET, Mercury Interactive WinRunner, Mercury Interactive TestDirector, MS Office Tools, Lotus Notes/Domino, Java, ETL, DB2. So far Anushree has not gained any managerial experience.
